qas.question: What devices have been credited as the moving force of the Industrial Revolution?
Along with road vehicles, locomotives and ships, on what vehicles were steam engines used during the Industrial Revolution?
What is an example of a steam-powered automobile?
Along with mills and mines, in what industrial locations did steam drive machines?
What did the use of steam engines in farming lead to?

answers.text: increase in the land available for cultivation
increase in the land available for cultivation
an increase in the land available for cultivation

qas.question: What devices have been credited as the moving force of cultivation?
Along with road vehicles, locomotives and ships, on what vehicles were steam engines used during cultivation?
What is an example of a road vehicle?
Along with mills and mines, in what industrial locations did steam drive cultivation?

plausible_answers.text: increase in the land available for cultivation

qas.question: What did the use of motorcycles in farming lead to?
